name: RogueValleyMall
0:
”Alexa, ask Rogue Valley Mall what restaurants they have”
”Alexa, ask Rogue Valley Mall what time do they open”
”Alexa, ask Rogue Valley Mall if there are any jobs available”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rogue valley mall
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Rogue Valley Mall’s skill will let you know all the important information and happenings at the center. Whether you’re curious what type of stores they have, where to get a rideshare, when they will be closing, or what the next upcoming event is, download this skill to be informed on all things at Rogue Valley Mall. You can access this skill on any of your Alexa devices.

To get started, enable Rogue Valley Mall’s skill through the Alexa App or by saying, “Alexa, open Rogue Valley Mall.”

If you’re having trouble, please visit www.roguevalleymall.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
